mapper.sql: t.order_id as t_order_id, t.order_code as t_order_code, t.ctime as t_ctime, t.type as t_type, t.status as t_status, t.num as t_num, t.price as t_price, t.total_money as t_total_money, t.pay_time as t_pay_time, t.user_id as t_user_id, t.remark as t_remark, t.product_name as t_product_name, t.pay_type as t_pay_type, t.relation_id as t_relation_id, t.relation_name as t_relation_name, t.over_time as t_over_time, t.product_img as t_product_img, t.sub_order_id as t_sub_order_id, t.confirm_time as t_confirm_time, t.prepay_order_code as t_prepay_order_code, t.is_show as t_is_show
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,u.username as username,u.flag as flag,u.user_id as userId from bjwg_order t left join bjwg_user u on t.user_id = u.user_id
order by ${orderByClause}

select count(t.order_id) as orderCount,sum(t.total_money) as orderTotalMoney,count(b.order_id) as waitOrderCount from bjwg_order t left join (select a.order_id from bjwg_order a where a.status = 4) b on t.order_id = b.order_id
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into bjwg_order (order_code, ctime, type, status, num, price, total_money, pay_time, user_id, remark, product_name, pay_type, relation_id, relation_name, over_time, product_img, sub_order_id, confirm_time, prepay_order_code, is_show) values (#{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{num,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{relationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{relationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{confirmTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{prepayOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isShow,jdbcType=TINYINT})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

mapper.select: select count(*) from bjwg_order t left join bjwg_user u on t.user_id = u.user_id
mapper.update:
update bjwg_order
order_code = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
num = #{num,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_money = #{totalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
relation_id = #{relationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
relation_name = #{relationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
over_time = #{overTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
product_img = #{productImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sub_order_id = #{subOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
confirm_time = #{confirmTime,jdbcType=DATE},
prepay_order_code = #{prepayOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_show = #{isShow,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bjwg_order set order_code = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, num = #{num,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_money = #{totalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, relation_id = #{relationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, relation_name = #{relationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, over_time = #{overTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, product_img = #{productImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_order_id = #{subOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, confirm_time = #{confirmTime,jdbcType=DATE}, prepay_order_code = #{prepayOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_show = #{isShow,jdbcType=TINYINT} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: update bjwg_order set status = #{0} where type = #{1} and status = #{2} and user_id in ( #{3} )

select
distinct
t.order_id as t_order_id, t.type as t_type, t.num as t_num, t.relation_id as t_relation_id from bjwg_order t
order by ${orderByClause}
